articles.title: India’s latest chip venture little more than a piece of paper? - Economic Times
articles.description: Indias government is offering almost $7 billion of enticements to boost the electronics manufacturing sector, which includes a production-linked incentives scheme, and a strong desire to move up the value chain from simple assembly to more technologically adv…
articles.content: This weeks announcement that Indias Vedanta Group has tied up with Taiwans Foxconn Technology Group to make chips is being lauded as proof that New Delhi is gaining traction with its plans to build a… [+4433 chars]
